mapper.select: select a.name as name, count(b.REST_ID) as reviewCnt,avg(b.star) as star from tb_rest a left outer join tb_review b on a.rest_id = b.rest_id left outer join TB_USER c on b.id=c.id group by a.name, c.sex HAVING c.sex='f' order by reviewCnt desc

select a.name name, count(b.REST_ID) reviewCnt,avg(b.star) as star from tb_rest a left outer join tb_review b on a.rest_id = b.rest_id left outer join TB_USER c on b.id=c.id group by a.name, c.sex HAVING c.sex='m' order by reviewCnt desc

select b.NAME as name, count(a.review_id) as reviewCnt, avg(a.star) as star from TB_REVIEW a inner join TB_REST b on a.REST_ID=b.REST_ID where to_char(a.REG_DATE,'mm')=#{mm} group by b.REST_ID, b.NAME

select b.NAME as name, count(a.review_id) as reviewCnt, avg(a.star) as star from TB_REVIEW a inner join TB_REST b on a.REST_ID=b.REST_ID inner join TB_USER c on a.id=c.ID where c.age between 20 and 30 group by b.REST_ID, b.NAME order by star desc
